text: Hayat Sher Pao Shaheed railway station (, ) is located in Hayat Sher Pao Shaheed village, Nowshera district of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways * Hayat Sherpao ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Nowshera District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Hayat Sher Pao Shaheed railway station
